DOC.brief_summary: To prevent excess increase blood pressure child provide two serving dairy food snack daily school . We hypothesize child receive two dairy snack exhibit significantly less increase blood pressure six month compare control child .
DOC.brief_title: Dairy Foods Blood Pressure Multi-Ethnic Children
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim study determine impact dairy food blood pressure ; however , also evaluate effect intervention body weight composition . Specifically , evaluate change body mass index ( BMI , kg/m2 ] , waist circumference subject body composition bioelectrical impedance ( BIA ) subset . We hypothesize child receive dairy snack exhibit less increase BMI body fat control subject . We study group child high risk elevate blood lipid glucose intolerance due racial/ethnic makeup high prevalence overweight obesity . Thus , evaluate impact intervention blood lipid , glucose insulin subset subject . We hypothesize child receive dairy food exhibit improvement lipid , glucose insulin compare control child . We also plan determine eating habit 24 hour dietary recall beginning , middle end study , 2 additional recall subset time point . Dietary behavior self efficacy analyze intervention questionnaire . Physical activity level assess short physical activity questionnaire student utilization accelerometer subset . Our control school undergo testing , receive intervention .
DOC.criteria: Willingness participate study Signed inform consent form parent and/or guardian Assent child Children food allergy dietary requirement restrict ability consume snack Children chronic medical condition may influence blood pressure calcium metabolism renal disease type 1 diabetes mellitus
